column5: Hey long time lurker first time poster id like to introduce my self my name is josh ive been fishing for 3 years mostly bass, channels, bowfin and panfish. Ive attempted trout salmon muskies and carp with no success. I joined this site to learn more techniques and maybe land a carp or salmonoid. I also just read this online and thought it was a fascinating read for anyone that lives in Hamilton it also makes me see coots paradise and the desjardin canal differently.  http://www.historyco...1/bouchier.html      Tight lines   josh
Welcome to the group Josh!!! Fridays are quiet in here  You should get a whole mess of people saying hi soon, i hope
Hi Josh, hope to read some good reports and see some fish pics real soon! Welcome..
Hope you'll catch some bowfin this summer... It's not something we catch further north. Welcome.
Welcome aboard. Thanks for the article, that was a good morning coffee read.  Clarence
No worries pictures coming soon. Tommorow ill be fishing for sheepies down at bayfront so if i catch any ill make a report
Welcome Josh. As you propably already know, you're joining an experienced, good group of anglers on this forum who like to have a little fun in life.
